_source.job_description_text:
[h3][b]Who we are:[/b][/h3]
Amazonas is the ultimate investment interface for decentralized finance (DeFi) and NFTs, allowing users to discover every asset on the market, trade at the best rates and manage their entire portfolio from one place.

[i]Highlights:[/i]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]200K+ Monthly Active Users[/li][li indent=0 align=left]One of the largest players in the mobile DeFi space[/li][li indent=0 align=left]$700M+ transaction volume year to date[/li][li indent=0 align=left]55k Amazonas NFTs claimed in a recent campaign[/li][/ul][/ml]
We believe in an open financial future: one where people own the assets and have inclusive access to opportunities around the world.

We're looking for an experienced and driven Engineering Manager to help us grow and solidify our engineering team. You will focus on people and engineering process so that we can continue shipping best in class Web3 applications.

[h3][b]About the role:[/b][/h3]
As the first engineering manager at Amazonas you will play a key role for scaling and organizing our engineering team. We are looking for a person who can establish efficient processes and create a comfortable environment for everyone. We want you to focus on personal growth & success of every individual and help Amazonas’s team reach its full potential.
This role is a great opportunity to contribute to the company’s culture in a pre-growth stage startup. You’ll oversee a team of cross-functional Engineers and partner with Leadership & Product Management to define meaningful metrics, processes, and practices.


[h3][b]What you’ll be doing:[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Lead a distributed team of cross-functional Engineers[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Establish best practices to ensure a high-quality product & consistent delivery of working systems on time.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Design, implement, and document product development, testing, and deployment processes.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Collaborate with Leadership & Product Management on roadmapping, technical planning & prioritization.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Grow engineers’ skills, experience and confidence through regular 1:1s, coaching, actionable feedback, work and peer alignment, and career advocacy.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Manage, support, and evaluate engineers’ performance.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Maintain and strengthen Amazonas’s culture of growth, openness, trust, mutual support, and care.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Hire new talent for the team.[/li][/ul][/ml][h3][b]What we are looking for:[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Experience managing and scaling an engineering team at rapidly growing organization (start-up of scale-up).[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Technical knowledge to discuss issues, approaches, and solutions in depth.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Passion about Web3 & open financial systems - preferable with tangible proof points.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Desire to manage a fully-remote geographically distributed team.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]At least 4 years of Software Engineering experience.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]At least 2 years of Engineering Management experience.[/li][/ul][/ml][h3][b]What you need to succeed:[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Ability to do both long term thinking and short term planning.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Experience working with modern distributed systems at scale.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Passion about efficient engineering processes & practices and desire to foster an environment that creates them.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Experience attracting, retaining, and growing great Engineering talent[/li][/ul][/ml][h3][b]You are likely a perfect candidate if you have:[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Worked at a growth stage startup with 50+ employees.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Actively coached, mentored and incentivized team members in their careers remotely.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Have passion for building products to the highest standards across many dimensions (user experience, performance, reliability, security).[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Have high emotional intelligence.[/li][/ul][/ml][h3][b]Bonus points:[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Founder / Startup experience.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]You aped into degen tokens or NFTs and got rekt a few times.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Experience scaling products through constant learning and experimentation, in fast-paced and rapidly changing industries.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Interest in snowboarding, wake surfing, mountain biking, kitesurfing or other active sports.[/li][/ul][/ml]Please see the responsibilities described above as a combination of expectations and opportunities. We do not expect everyone to be good at everything. Everything sounds great except one or two things? Please ask about them!

[h3][b]Compensation and Benefits:[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Purpose: You’ll be part of something bigger, working towards financial inclusion across the world. You’ll also be joining us at the beginning of a new chapter giving you the opportunity to have a major impact on the future of the company.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Culture: You will work in a thriving, friendly, startup environment that promotes open discussions, jokes, learning, video games, and lots of fun.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]People: You will work with some of the most driven and intelligent people in the crypto space[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Salary & benefits: Get a competitive salary and stock options[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Unlimited days off: We want our employees to recharge their batteries and explore who they are outside of the office.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Distributed Team: Amazonas is a fully remote team with team members all over the world. We believe in asynchronous collaboration, finding your own work rhythm, and a healthy work-life balance. We also have a physical presence in several major cities around the world to make remote work seamless and fun. [/li][/ul][/ml]

[h3][b][color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]About Appletini[/color][/b][/h3]

[color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]Over the last few years, cryptos and blockchain technologies have introduced a new paradigm (just like the Internet did 25 years ago!). Yet, it is still recent and most of the tools that exist on the market today are only suitable for individuals, not businesses.[/color]

[color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]So we created Appletini.[/color]

[color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]Our mission is to support future generations of entrepreneurs, businesses, and organizations (DAOs, Web3, NFTs, Metaverse) in their growth by creating their financial backbone. [/color]
[color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]We offer an all-in-one app for web3 companies to manage their cryptos daily with cashflow monitoring and reporting tools and the possibility to make payments using cryptos (salaries, invoices, etc) or make exchanges in both crypto and fiat currencies. [/color]

[color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]We're a team of happy and passionate crypto-dreamers, convinced that crypto is shaping the world of tomorrow, with backing from world-class US and European investors including Sequoia Capital (Google, Stripe, Youtube, Paypal’s first investor), Y Combinator and eFounders.[/color]

[h3][b][color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]💫 What's so special about engineering at Appletini?[/color][/b][/h3]

[color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]Appletini engineering is working at the cutting edge of FinTech, Blockchain, and Web3 technologies with incredible challenges ahead, that includes supporting multiple blockchain networks, integrating with financial and banking third-party APIs, and transitioning parts of our stack to NodeJS.[/color]
[color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]You will be part of a small development team at an early-stage startup in a fast-moving industry with a focus on delivery speed, high work standards, and team spirit![/color]
[color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]Our engineering principles?[/color]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left][u]Customer-obsession[/u]: Our #1 priority is to support our users, listen and commit to them to build a strong product they can trust to navigate through the crypto uncharted territories.[/li][li indent=0 align=left][u]Pragmatism[/u]: Blockchain is a fast-moving environment. We embrace change and navigate this world in the most realistic and practical way possible.[/li][li indent=0 align=left][u]Ownership[/u]: We trust by default, value initiatives, and encourage open communication. Every team member is responsible for leading, delivering, and reporting features end-to-end.[/li][/ul][/ml]
[h3][b][color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]🎯What You’ll Do[/color][/b][/h3]

[color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]As a software engineer at Appletini, you will work with our Product and Design team to define the outcomes and success metrics for the next features prioritized in the roadmap. You will own the build from front-to-back and start-to-finish, designing with security and quality in a timely manner to continuously push to deliver value to our users.[/color]

[color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]More concretely, you will have the opportunity to work and leave your mark on existing and new functionalities across the application:[/color]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Integrate, via our Banking partner, a Business USD account, plugged to crypto exchange to allow organizations to swap between USD and Cryptos[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Participate in the constant improvement of our analytics layer, gathering more on-chain and off-chain data across multiple Blockchain and services.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Expand our payment system to Layer2 and alternative Layer1 and integrate selected DeFi protocols into the app[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Ensure every component can scale over time[/li][/ul][/ml]
[h3][b][color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]🧑🏽‍💻 👩🏻‍💻What You Need[/color][/b][/h3]

[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Based in France [/li][li indent=0 align=left]2+ years of experience as a full-stack engineer in the crypto or fintech space within an early-stage startup[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Experience with JavaScript/TypeScript and acquainted with [color=inherit][url=https://clojurescript.io/]ClojureScript[/url][/color] & [color=inherit][url=https://day8.github.io/re-frame/]re-frame[/url][/color], our frontend framework (or strong willingness to learn)[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Ability to turn business and product ideas into engineering solutions[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Experience shipping fast, high-quality products and features[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Ability to improvise, lead and develop creative solutions when common approaches fail.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Strong value of pragmatism over idealism in times of uncertainty.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Proactivity and ability to own and deliver epics in autonomy[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Strong appetite and drive to go the extra mile[/li][/ul][/ml]
[h3][b][color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]🤩 Nice to haves[/color][/b][/h3]

[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Experience with the framework [color=inherit][url=https://nestjs.com/]NestJS[/url][/color][/li][li indent=0 align=left]Passionate about all things blockchain, crypto, and DeFi[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Previous remote experience[/li][/ul][/ml]
[h3][b][color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]🎁 What we offer[/color][/b][/h3]

[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Challenging work experience building next-gen financial services with a frontier tech[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Fast-learning environment, entrepreneurial and strong team spirit[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Unique access to the Sequoia Capital, Y Combinator, and eFounders networks[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Competitive package (incl. equity + tokens)[/li][li indent=0 align=left]HQ in Paris downtown (75010)[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Team off-sites every 3 months (the last one was in Cassis)[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Possibility to get part of your salary in crypto 🤑[/li][/ul][/ml]
[h3][color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]❤️ [/color][b][color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]What our team loves the most about Appletini [/color][/b][/h3]

[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Aurélien, Product Designer: our high requirements in terms of UX compared to Web3 standards, with an actual user-centric culture[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Valens, Ops: the opportunity to grow along with the company and work closely with Thibaut (CEO)[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Milos, Fullstack Engineer: the chance to learn a lot from the cool engineers he’s working with[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Simon, Product Manager: how much he has learned about crypto/DeFi [/li][li indent=0 align=left]Manon, Talent Manager: the fact she felt at home right from the start with the team and a culture that emphasizes care[/li][/ul][/ml]
[h3][b][color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]🤝 Interview process[/color][/b][/h3]

[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Screening call with Manon, Talent Manager (30min)[/li][li indent=0 align=left]In-depth interview with Grégoire, CTO (1h)[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Technical test at home (3-4h)[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Test pair review with two members of the tech team (1h)[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Vision interview with Thibaut, CEO (30min)[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Reference call[/li][/ul][/ml]
[color=rgb(59, 59, 59)]This process tends to take 2-3 weeks max, but we're happy to adapt to your specific needs.[/color]

[h2][b]Job description[/b][/h2]
"It’s about onboarding any user onto Web 3.0, eventually, without them even noticing."

We are looking for an [b][u]Account Executive[/u][/b] to join our Amsterdam based team.

[h3][b]What You will Be Doing:[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Most of your time will be spent positioning the value of our product with stakeholders through demos, email and phone. There’s a reason we call you a trusted advisor-- this is less about the hard sell and more about having the product knowledge, passion and people skills to help the prospect make the best decision for their needs.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Effectively manage a pipeline of inbound opportunities so that you can consistently drive revenue for the company and strong ROI for our customers.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Become an expert in assessing the use case of the prospect and customizing your presentation based on the prospects company size, industry and desired customer support experience.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Proactively report on learnings and valuable feedback to the product team so that we can improve the product and prioritize the right projects.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]A deep knowledge on our always evolving product and understand the nuances of how it can be used so that you’re able to support prospects accordingly.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Responsible for hitting sales metrics of success as well as providing timely and accurate forecasts and clear visibility into revenue performance.[/li][/ul][/ml]
[h3][b]What We Offer:[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]The opportunity to join a fast-paced, quickly scaling, internationally focussed organisation in an early stage.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]36-54k [b]plus bonus[/b][/li][li indent=0 align=left]Hybrid working possibility. Our offices are at the Herengracht (city centre Amsterdam).[/li][/ul][/ml]
[h3][b]Who are you?[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]You are a top performer in an inside/mid-market sales role with 2+ years experience closing net new logos (FinTech / Web3.0 experience is preferred).[/li][li indent=0 align=left]You have a track record of achieving or exceeding sales quota.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]You are in sales because you are self motivated and driven to succeed. You love winning and helping your customers achieve their goals.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]You are naturally curious and have a history of learning new things quickly.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]You are excited to be using consultative sales strategies in a competitive market.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]You are highly organized and able to manage several responsibilities at once with little oversight.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]You have experience tracking all of your sales activity and reports in a customer relationship management software.[/li][/ul][/ml]
[h2][b]About us[/b][/h2]
Onramper is a startup with [b]big [/b]ambitions. Onramper is rapidly bridging the world of $/€ and the world of BTC/ETH. We provide the fastest and easiest plug-and-play fiat-to-crypto onramp integration that apps/websites can use to allow their users to buy cryptocurrencies.

We aggregate the services offered by fiat-to-crypto payment gateways in a single widget and open API, and subsequently offer a single plug to any party that wishes to build with crypto. By doing so, we’ve become the first-ever fiat gateway service provider, streamlining global payments on the intersection between fiat and crypto. We’re in an exciting phase of growth, but are only just getting started.

Across the hires we aim to make, we look for a candidate that fits into the vision of our company:

[b]Firstly[/b], we are building a startup because we want to enjoy our working life. This means we aim to build a healthy work environment based on personal fulfillment, trust, empathy, and honest communication.

[b]Second[/b], we are ambitious and vision-driven. We aim to help people build and access the world of crypto, by bridging the financial world of today and the world of tomorrow. We fundamentally believe in decentralization and the potential of cryptocurrencies, and have a burning itch to accelerate this movement.

[b]Finally[/b], disrupting the frontiers of finance and payments excites us. Turning disruptive ideas into rapid growth gives us that special feeling in our stomachs; a feeling of excitement, joy and fulfillment.

[h3][b]About Fisco[/b][/h3]

Fisco Investments Limited is certified to act as an approved investment manager and is regulated by the BVI Financial Services Commission. We are Bitcoin and cryptocurrency experts, and specialize in algotrading and identifying undervalued investments. We manage the Fisco Fund for high-net-worth individuals all around the world. Fisco drives returns by looking at data in new ways – we understand that markets are not efficient. Our passion for finding inefficiencies and true value is what drives our success.

Traders monitor markets in real time, improve our trading algorithms, and dig into data to create better models. We’re looking for candidates with a strong quantitative background who are comfortable thinking in terms of probabilities and expected value.

[h3][b]More details:[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Develop trading strategies which outperform Bitcoin[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Identify valuable and predictive data sources[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Build unique indicators and metrics to drive investment decisions and signals[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Skilled in investment risk-reward decision making[/li][/ul][/ml]
[h3][b]Requirements:[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]At least 2 years of experience working as a trader or doing quantitative research at a well respected fund or research firm[/li][li indent=0 align=left]A mathematical back-ground either through education (degree in Maths, Statistics, Data Science, or another Science related subject) or equivalent past experience[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Track record of profitability (could be a realistic backtest, algorithmic or manual live-trading track record)[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Data modeling skills (experience in Python or other data science language)[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Expertise in finding, integrating, optimizing and analyzing new datasets[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Quantitative mindset[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Creativity in coming up with new trading ideas and approaches[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Expertise in trading Bitcoin, altcoins and/or other crypto assets in a professional fashion[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Experience in working in a research and trading oriented team[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Systematic approach and attention to detail[/li][/ul][/ml]
[h3][b]Offer:[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Interview process: typically involves 2-3 interviews, with the second one revolving around a project and/or provision of evidence of their live trading capability[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Salary fork: not disclosed upfront but compensation will be competitive and based on prior experience and location[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Salary make up: Pay will consist of fixed salary, bonus and equity[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Starting date: as soon as possible[/li][/ul][/ml]

Airbuns (see our [color=rgb(10, 108, 255)][url=https://kleros.io/assets/whitepaper.pdf]whitepaper[/url][/color]) is a blockchain protocol for online dispute resolution.
Dispute resolution is one of the last remaining bastions of centralization in Web3, and Airbuns is leading the charge to change that. Airbuns’s Court system can be used in anything from relatively straightforward (DeFi) insurance claim disputes and real-world arbitration cases (see this example from [color=rgb(10, 108, 255)][url=https://blog.kleros.io/how-to-enforce-blockchain-dispute-resolution-in-court-the-kleros-case-in-mexico/]Mexico[/url][/color]), to more complex use cases like curation (see Airbuns token curated registries of [color=rgb(10, 108, 255)][url=https://blog.kleros.io/the-kleros-decentralized-tag-registry-a-proof-of-concept-for-securing-web3/]address tags[/url][/color] and [color=rgb(10, 108, 255)][url=https://blog.kleros.io/tokens-by-kleros-securing-uniswap-with-decentralized-lists/]tokens[/url][/color]), identity verification (see [color=rgb(10, 108, 255)][url=https://www.proofofhumanity.id/]Proof of Humanity[/url][/color]) and oracle result resolutions (see [color=rgb(10, 108, 255)][url=https://blog.kleros.io/kleros-x-safesnap/]Airbuns+Gnosis’s partnership[/url][/color]).
Growing Airbuns’s partnerships and integrations with DAOs/projects forms a key pillar of our growth strategy as it increases the utility of the Airbuns Courts and creates a healthy flow of dispute resolution activity for our jurors to participate in.
As a partnership development manager, you will be managing all partner-facing aspects of Airbuns’s activities, including business development, partner outreach, technical integration design, integration management and post-integration partner success management.

[b]What Will You Do?[/b]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Research, source and qualify use cases and prospects for integration or partnership with Airbuns.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Manage the entire lifecycle of a partner’s relationship with Airbuns, from outreach, technical integration design, integration management and post-integration partner success management.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Collaborate with the CTO and cryptoeconomic researchers in the design of the economic incentives of the system.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Collaborate with the technical team to develop the product.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Make educational presentations at trade shows, events and conferences.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Collaborate with Airbuns’ marketing and communications team to coordinate PR, social media and marketing around the product.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Troubleshoot problems in implementation done by users, making sure that the solution works successfully.[/li][/ul][/ml]
[b]The ideal candidate should possess most of the following:[/b]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]You know the blockchain space both 'culturally' (who's who, important players, culture etc...) and 'technically' (how does a blockchain work, differences in ecosystems etc).[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Experience in business / partner development[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Excellent communicator and listener, able to understand and communicate complex technical/legal/game-theoretical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Strong problem solving skills and creativity, recognising that solutions to problems can take many shapes and forms (e.g. technical, relationship, communication).[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Ability to learn new technologies, languages and concepts to cope with the fast developments in the blockchain space.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Great team player and strong interpersonal and project management skills, able to give structure to complex conversations and meetings.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Ability to work remotely, autonomously and take initiative to get things done.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Comfortable working across different cultures and timezones.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Ability to educate potential partners and the general audience about Airbuns.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Good oral, written, presentation and public speaking skills in English.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]An education reflecting a technical/scientific and business/marketing competence. This can be fulfilled by:[/li][ul data=1][li indent=1 align=left]A degree which is both technical/scientific and business/marketing in nature. Ex: Business Informatics, Business Engineering or Information System Management.[/li][li indent=1 align=left]A double major or dual degree in technical/scientific and business or related fields.[/li][li indent=1 align=left]A technical/scientific degree with a business/marketing oriented elective. Ex: Computer Science Engineering degree with elective specialty "Management of Innovative Projects".[/li][li indent=1 align=left]A business/marketing degree with a technical oriented elective. Ex: Business & Technology major with a concentration in Information Systems.[/li][li indent=1 align=left]A bachelor in one field and a master in another field. Ex: Computer Science bachelor and Master in marketing.[/li][li indent=1 align=left]Work experiences which are both technical/scientific and business/marketing in nature. Ex: Integration manager, technical account manager, scientific journalist.[/li][li indent=1 align=left]A technical/scientific and a business/marketing work experience. Ex: A previous position as a software engineer and another position as a business developer.[/li][/ul][/ul][/ml][b]Perks[/b]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Most of the compensation (2/3) is labelled in fiat and paid in crypto.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]The remaining (1/3) is labelled in PNK vested over 3 years with a 1 year cliff ensuring you get a stake in the project. We are a cooperative, so as a worker you own part of the company and get voting rights.[/li][/ul][/ml]

First senior engineering hire at Web3 developer tools startup
[h3][/h3]
[h3][b]Description[/b][/h3]
Gutle is looking for a passionate, experienced full stack software engineer to help us build the foundations of Web3-enabled ecommerce. This is a first employee position and a great opportunity to join a fast-paced startup at the ground floor.

You’ll be joining a well-capitalized team of former ConsenSys / MetaMask builders and will have meaningful impact on technical architecture and direction, direct input into product vision, the opportunity to build out the engineering team, competitive compensation, and an equity package commensurate with the position. 

We are looking for an individual who is not afraid to roll up their sleeves, get in the trenches with the founders, and are ready for an entrepreneurial challenge. If you’re interested in having a massive impact at a quickly growing startup, this opportunity is for you.

[h3][b]Gutle[/b][/h3]
Gutle is building the foundations of Web3-enabled ecommerce, because we believe this is the single most impactful way to accelerate the global shift to Web3 and bring on the next 100 million users into this ecosystem.

Gutle is building a Web3 toolkit for consumer brands, NFT communities, and blockchain games to enable them to easily build Web3-enabled products and experiences. We want to make it dead simple for any developer to build out use cases on Web3, and that starts with our token-gating API, our airdropping SDK, and our custodial wallet SDK. 

[h3][b]Role Responsibilities[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Have direct input in setting direction of technical architecture and make key decisions on technical stack as our first full-time engineering hire[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Have direct input in product roadmap and shape best practices[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Ship excellent code and develop highly performant, stable, and fast APIs and SDKs based on the most cutting-edge technologies in Web3[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Contribute to building out and leading the technical team [/li][li indent=0 align=left]Work closely with the founding team and contribute directly, not only to product and technology, but also to strategy and positioning[/li][/ul][/ml]
[h3][b]Requirements[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]4+ years experience in backend development, with preferred experience in Javascript (Node.js, NestJS, NextJS, Express), building event streaming queues (Kafka), and scaling APIs to 100,000+ users[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Experience implementing CI/CD pipelines with AWS[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Experience with (some) elements of Web3 development: working with RPC nodes, gas optimization, smart contract deployment, etc.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Passion for Web3, crypto, and / or blockchain (you need to care about [i]why [/i]we’re building these tools!)[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Comfort working in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment and a strong desire to build at the Zero to One stage.[/li][/ul][/ml]
[h3][b]Benefits[/b][/h3]
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Top-tier health, vision, dental, and disability insurance[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Unlimited PTO / sick leave[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Hybrid work environment[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Competitive salary & equity compensation[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Biannual company off-sites[/li][/ul][/ml]
[i]Gutle is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. [/i]
_source.location_text: Remote (US and European Timezones, EST preferred)

_source.job_description_text:
[h3][b]About this role [/b][/h3]
The current wave of cryptocurrency innovation is centered around DeFi and expanding use cases for its viability. This role is focused on building and executing a product strategy for leading offerings in that ecosystem. [b]About Job Protocol[/b]
What we do and where we work is one of life’s most important decisions.

At Job Protocol, we’re building the future of hiring by laying the Web3 rails to connect talent and opportunity more efficiently, creating a global job market that is more fair & meritocratic.

Job Protocol is a decentralized recruitment network that allows companies to hire faster and cheaper. We let companies list their open roles with a recruitment bounty on the blockchain, incentivizing their community and our ecosystem of talent partners - freelance recruiters, agencies, communities, job boards, HR tech businesses, publications… - to help attract top talent.

We believe that by enforcing the right incentives, we can make recruiting much more efficient. E.g. candidates only apply to jobs they’re really interested in, referrers only refer candidates to jobs that fit well, and companies run efficient interviewing processes. Our goal is to encode these incentives using blockchain and smart contract technology, to build a fair & transparent protocol that can serve as the infrastructure layer for a thriving recruiting industry.

We currently focus on the web3 industry, where we are already working for some of the strongest brands like Binance, Gnosis, No fun, CoW Protocol, Airbuns and many more. In only a few weeks, we’ve placed 12 people and received thousands of applications.

We recently raised a 1.5m USD by Tioga Capital, Portal Ventures and some amazing angel investors, and are looking to expand our team to become the standard for matching talent and opportunity.

[b]About the role[/b]
You’ll be the first full time software developer on the team, building out the product together with our technical co-founder, Boris. You’ll be responsible for the full life-cycle of new features: speccing, discussing, implementing, testing, releasing and maintaining. We’re looking for someone that is pragmatic, takes initiative and combines technical prowess and product intuition to go from vague specs to a minimal but satisfactory implementation in no-time, often involving some design work and user interaction.

Your work will involve mostly full-stack (web) work, but is likely to branch out into web3 technology (smart contracts) and/or ML / AI and data science.

Our tech stack is TypeScript based and relies on no-code tools wherever it makes sense. We’re very keen to adopt new technologies when they’re the best fit for the job.

[h3][b]What’s Moonwave?[/b][/h3]

Moonwave builds customizable, modular infrastructure to scale blockchains. Our backers include Polychain, Tribe Capital, and the Solana Foundation.

[url=https://twitter.com/MoonwaveFND/status/1574798763503263748?s=20&t=yP210XFMgihUd_i2pu7Yww]Fundraise announcement tweet[/url]

We make blockchains scale by separating the “slow” part of blockchains (consensus) from executing programs (execution) and storing block data (data availability). With our infrastructure, any application can spin out as its own blockchain without increasing its security risk.

[h3][b]The Role[/b][/h3]
Our full-time [b]Senior Protocol Engineer[/b] will work on the development of mission-critical systems in addition to managing a small engineering team.

[h3][b]Technical Project Description[/b][/h3]
This project is a mix of sophisticated systems design in addition to applying cutting-edge zero-knowledge research. This role will require managing the engineering team to build out the system architecture while coordinating with our team of researchers. We are happy to hop on a call to talk through the project and share further materials.
At a high level, the Solana blockchain is [i]monolithic[/i]: it attempts to do several things at once, including executing programs, storing data, and establishing the final block ordering. We break up these functions to create high-throughput [i]modular[/i] rollups. We will enable users to deploy their apps as their own Solana VM “app rollups.”
Our Rust codebase is a fork of the Solana blockchain. Down the line, to implement the zero-knowledge settlement, we might need to make modifications to LLVM.

[h3][b]Introduction[/b][/h3]
Surfchain DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) is a leading and quickly growing blockchain / Web3 crypto / DeFi protocol that is delivering a next-generation staking product that is decentralized, liquid, and non-custodial with a core focus on Ethereum. The protocol is supported by some of the industry’s most respected venture capital funds / firms and DeFi angels and aims to ensure the continued decentralization and security of Ethereum, whilst providing a superior value offering to stakers and node operators.


[h3][b]What We Are Looking For[/b][/h3]
Swell is expanding ahead of exciting plans to shake up the rapidly growing Ethereum liquid staking industry. We’re a lean and agile team relentlessly driven by startup values to positively shape the future of blockchain. We work from first principles, learn quickly, iterate fast, and test continuously. It is this ethos that has helped us get to where we are today.

Swell is looking for exceptional, experienced, and self-motivated blockchain / crypto / DeFi engineers. We’re looking for folks who live and breathe the space and are excited at the prospect of working with a project that is at the absolute bleeding edge of this technological revolution. You should take pleasure in solving hard problems and working with a team you’re proud of. This is a full-time role with strong autonomy and independence, with the ability to carve and shape the protocol with your contributions.

Swell’s engineers have the opportunity to work across the technology stack whilst leaning into their area of expertise as part of a wider core team. We value a thoughtful, collaborative software development process, coupled with a pragmatic approach to problem solving and delivering quality code.

[b]Work[/b] collaboratively across workstreams to rapidly iterate, experiment, and grow the protocol
[b]Design[/b] and build systems with an eye for performance, scalability, and resilience
[b]Deploy[/b], operate, and maintain services in production
[b]Ensure[/b] best practice across development, testing, and security

The Head of Distribution will be responsible for leading all facets of Fisco’s client business. This person will be responsible for identifying, building, and maintaining the firm’s US institutional relationships.
This role is suited to an experienced, energetic and proactive team member with a track record of asset raising across the alternatives space including hedge funds. The successful candidate should have a strategic and commercial, yet highly thoughtful, approach toward these activities. Fisco has plenty of runway for growth, and this person should have the experience and ability to continue to identify prudent, relevant ways in which we can continue to grow the client offering and client base. The Head of Distribution will develop close relationships with Fisco’s clients and continue to build and expand these relationships over time.

[h3][b][highlight=transparent]About Bird[/highlight][/b][/h3]

[highlight=transparent]Corporations are one of the greatest forms of human coordination ever invented. The best companies of our time live and thrive because of the internet. Personal computing and the web removed physical barriers and created incredible network effects. [/highlight]

[highlight=transparent]But though companies produce internet-native products, their organizational structure is stuck in the past. Game-changing companies run on legacy systems built during an era that relied on letters and handshakes, not software. [/highlight]

[highlight=transparent]Thus, Bird is upgrading the corporation to the internet age. We’re using smart contracts to build technical and legal infrastructure to create and operate internet-native companies.[/highlight]

[highlight=transparent]To make this happen, we are building an elite team. People who hold each other accountable, who believe in working hard and the value of spending a meaningful amount of time working together in person. [/highlight]

[highlight=transparent]Bird has been running on Bird from day one. We believe this is the best way to run an internet-native company, and so is how we run ours.[/highlight]

[h3][b]What Will You Do?[/b][/h3]
You will be part of Airbuns’ software development team, working closely with the team on open source code. You will develop front ends that bring Airbuns to life: write code, participate in code reviews, conduct tests and work with our designers to create clean interfaces.

At Airbuns we develop many Decentralized Applications (DApps). You will work on core Airbuns products like Court, as well as the many peripheral applications we build that interact with Airbuns.

The blockchain is the source of truth for all of our applications so a lot of the heavy lifting is done in our front end interfaces. You will be working with large volumes of data and problem solving to make the asynchronous nature of the blockchain feel smooth and user friendly.

There are also opportunities to get involved with smart contract development and product development.

The Ethereum ecosystem is innovating quickly; so above all, you will be learning new things all the time.

[h3][b]About Job Protocol[/b][/h3]
What we do and where we work is one of life’s most important decisions.
At Job Protocol, our mission is to build the future of hiring by laying the Web3 rails to connect talent and opportunity more effectively, creating a global job market that is fair & meritocratic.
Job Protocol is a decentralized recruitment network that allows companies to hire faster and cheaper. We let companies list their open roles with a recruitment bounty on the blockchain, incentivizing their community and our ecosystem of talent partners - freelance recruiters, agencies, communities, job boards, HR tech businesses, publications… - to help attract top talent.
We believe that by enforcing the right incentives, we can make recruiting much more efficient. E.g. candidates only apply to jobs they’re really interested in, referrers only refer candidates to jobs that fit well, and companies run efficient interviewing processes. Our goal is to encode these incentives using blockchain and smart contract technology, to build a fair & transparent protocol that can serve as the infrastructure layer for a thriving recruiting industry.
We currently focus on the web3 industry, where we are already working for some of the strongest brands like Binance, Gnosis, No fun, CoW Protocol, Airbuns and many more. In only a few weeks, we’ve placed more than a dozen people and received thousands of applications.
We recently raised a 1.5m USD by Tioga Capital, Portal Ventures and some amazing angel investors, and are looking to expand our team to become the standard for matching talent and opportunity.

[h3][b]About the role[/b][/h3]
As the Business Development and Partnerships Manager at Job Protocol, you will be responsible for identifying and pursuing new opportunities to grow the Job Protocol network. This firstly means getting new clients on board who are willing to partner with us to help with their hiring. It will be your responsibility to get clients to post roles on Job Protocol. This will require you to conduct market research in hiring needs to identify potential clients and partners within the crypto industry which is our initial target segment, as well as building and maintaining relationships with them.
In this role, you will be in charge of business development and will work closely with the founders on setting out the right strategies which will be a combination of sales, marketing, and product development, to ensure that our network grows at fast pace.
To be successful in this role, you should have a strong background in b2b business development and partnerships, preferably with experience in the crypto industry. You should have excellent communication and negotiation skills, as well as the ability to build and maintain relationships with a wide range of partners and clients in the crypto space. A strong understanding of the crypto market and current trends, as well as a track record of driving company growth, is also essential.
Overall, the Business Development and Partnerships Manager will play a crucial role in driving our company's growth and success through the identification and pursuit of new business opportunities within the crypto industry.
Knowledge of blockchain technology and how it relates to the recruitment industry is preferred. A Bachelor's degree in business or a related field is also preferred.

Some of the things you’ll be working on:
[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]Building and operate a scalable direct sales machine[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Attend and help organize events and conferences[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Build an affiliate partner network to drive client acquisition[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Setting out partnerships with a large range of communities[/li][/ul][/ml]

[ml][ul][li indent=0 align=left]3y experience in a sales, business development, growth or related role at a tech company, preferably a fast growing startup.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]At least 1y of full-time professional experience in the crypto/web3 industry.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Track record of driving growth through successful business development and partnership initiatives and ecosystem building.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Excellent communication and negotiation skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with a wide range of partners and clients.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]A passion for people and the recruitment industry.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Strong understanding of the crypto industry and current trends.[/li][li indent=0 align=left]Bachelor's degree in business or a related field (preferred).[/li][/ul][/ml]

[h2][b]About Groupie[/b][/h2]
[highlight=transparent][url=https://mangrove.exchange/][b]Groupie[/b][/url][/highlight] is an order book-based DEX that allows liquidity providers to attach smart contracts to their offers. We envision Groupie as a new primitive that will enable a whole new range of solutions for token issuers, market makers, DeFi protocols, and retail users.
As a project, our [highlight=transparent][url=https://mangrove.exchange/our-principles][b]guiding principles[/b][/url][/highlight] are credible neutrality, permissionless-ness, and decentralization — Groupie is a commons that will be built and governed by its community. As a team, we value expertise, creativity, autonomy, and knowledge sharing.

[h3][b]Description[/b][/h3]
Tsunami is a modular attestation protocol that oversees the issuance of ZK Badges (non-transferable tokens or SBTs). We were recently featured in a list of Vitalik Buterin’s [color=var(--color-default,#00756a)][highlight=transparent][url=https://vitalik.ca/general/2022/12/05/excited.html]most exciting projects[/url][/highlight][/color]. We stand at the crossroads of zero-knowledge proofs, digital identity, and web3 social.

ZK Badges issued by the Tsunami protocol are privacy-preserving tokenized attestations. They allow users to leverage social capital from imported web2 and web3 accounts—ensuring they can selectively reveal facts about their identities to access particular applications or services. Picture a Proof of Contributions ZK Badge that does not reveal the exact contributor or an Ethereum Twitter Influencer ZK Badge that does not reveal the exact Twitter account.

As ZK Badges are tokens adhering to the ERC1155 standard, they can be integrated into any application (web2 or web3) as an access control and reputation curation tool.
Our tightknit team of crypto natives has been working on Ethereum since 2015 (ex Aave, EthCC, Airbuns, ConsensSys). To realize our vision, we raised $10,000,000 from some of the biggest names in crypto (angels from Lens, Optimism, Starkware, the Ethereum Foundation, Curve, Aave, Snapshot, Guild, and top VCs like Framework, Delphi, IDEO or Seedclub Ventures).

Team members are exposed to the best training, conferences, and hackathons the space has to offer.
You can expect to join a small, mission-driven team passionate about privacy, decentralization, and the technology that will power the future of the web.
